td.p: Thomson, John. Journal, Mackenzie River, 1800-1802. An electronic transcription. MFTP #0021

div.p: [A] short time after there arrived 16 in place of 4 that is including 4 Boys[.] They have brought nothing else but a little Meat, not a single skin amongst them all – what few they have they left behind en cache, notwithstanding they all owe Credits & some of them to a pretty Considerable amount[.] I told them that they have made a useless voyage, for untill such time as they pay their old Debts, I canot give them a single Skin on Credit[.] These Indians are encamped on the sides of a Lake where they have been ever since the fall doing nothing else but Fishing[.] Traded 14 skins Dry Meat , 8 of Pounded, 2 carribou thighs[,] 2 do shoulders, 2 origl noses, one Beaver Tail, 11 Old white fish, & 8 skins hare snares[.] Altho I paid them for their Provissions much more then their real value, yet they were by no means contented, indeed they set such a very great value upon that Article that there is no such thing as contesting them[.] They are certainly the most thoughtless set that ever existed, for when I reflect what miserable objects they were untill only of Late, & that many of them if they are now alive may thank us[.] Notwithstanding we often repeat that to them, it does not appear to make much impression upon them, on the contrary they endeavor to exceed each other in trying to deceive us[.] In short to draw their General Character you may without hesitation call them the greatest Liars, Cowards & Gluttons of all other Indians[.]

Friday the 21st[.] Snowed near Six Inches last night[.] Early in the afternoon all the Indians went away, desired them to ma[ke] as much haste as possible, to bring their Credits in order to get more &c[.] They Loitered a long time (but in vain) in expectation of getting Guns & kettles on Credit[.] La Beccasse came back yesterday with these Indians[.] Sent him along with St Cir to pass the Winter with them – gave them a Dram & a little Dry Meat[.] The Little Chief who came yesterday to pay me a vissit went away this morning, he traded 4 Skins
